metadata.focus: Discovering new sources for underrepresented STEEPS categories
metadata.discovery_method: Targeted web search with specialized keywords

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Wellness economy, mental wellness policy, spirituality research
new_sources_spiritual.notes: Leading authority on wellness economics. Released 2024 Mental Wellness Policy Toolkit addressing stress, loneliness, and social prescribing. Tracks $6.8T global wellness economy across 11 sectors.
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: Tier 1 source for Spiritual category - combines policy, research, and economic analysis with strong institutional credibility

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Contemplative practices, meditation research, Buddhist studies, phenomenology
new_sources_spiritual.notes: Official journal of University of Virginia Contemplative Sciences Center. Publishes humanities-based and transdisciplinary scholarship on contemplation. ISSN: 3066-9030.
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: High-quality academic source for Spiritual/contemplative studies - peer-reviewed and institutionally backed

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Contemplative research, mindfulness interventions, well-being science
new_sources_spiritual.notes: University of Virginia's leading center for contemplative sciences. Operates CIRCL Lab for transdisciplinary research. Mission: fuse contemplation, connection, research to enhance flourishing.
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: Top-tier academic research center combining rigorous science with contemplative practices

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Well-being science, meditation neuroscience, mental health research
new_sources_spiritual.notes: Founded by Richard Davidson (pioneer of contemplative neuroscience) at UW-Madison. First to discover meditation increases gamma oscillations. Collaborates with Dalai Lama's Mind & Life Institute.
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: World-leading research on meditation neuroscience - Richard Davidson is a foundational figure in the field

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Meaning research, existential psychology, positive psychology integration
publication_types: International Journal of Existential Positive Psychology
new_sources_spiritual.notes: Official publication of Int'l Society for Existential Psychology. Currently on hiatus after Dr. Paul Wong's passing, but archives remain valuable. Publishes research on meaning dimensions: coherence, purpose, significance.
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: Important academic source for meaning/purpose research, though currently inactive

new_sources_spiritual.specialization: Evidence-based mindfulness education, workplace wellness, accessibility
new_sources_spiritual.notes: UCLA Health's mindfulness education center. Emphasizes 'radical accessibility' with free resources. Strong focus on institutional implementation (medical, educational, business settings).
new_sources_spiritual.discovery_rationale: Practical implementation focus complements academic research sources

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Climate policy, environmental economics, biodiversity finance, just transition
new_sources_environmental.notes: LSE's flagship climate institute. Five research clusters: climate impacts & resilience, cutting emissions, financing, global action, protecting environment. Climate Research Showcase 2026 submissions open until Feb 4.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Top-tier Environmental source with strong political/economic integration - addresses policy gaps

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Social-ecological resilience, planetary boundaries, biodiversity, food systems
new_sources_environmental.notes: Stockholm University + Beijer Institute collaboration. Developed planetary boundaries framework (2009). Research themes: Anthropocene dynamics, ocean futures, food systems, transformative pathways.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Leading authority on planetary boundaries and social-ecological systems - foundational Environmental source

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Marine biodiversity, ocean conservation, EBSA identification, deep-sea ecosystems
new_sources_environmental.notes: International partnership supporting Convention on Biological Diversity. Active since 2008. Expertise in ecologically/biologically significant marine areas (EBSAs), migratory connectivity (MiCO system), high seas protection.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Critical source for ocean/marine biodiversity - underrepresented in current Environmental coverage

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Marine protection effectiveness, ocean data, high seas governance, MPAs
new_sources_environmental.notes: Science-based marine protection organization. Flagship tool: MPAtlas tracks global ocean protection quality. Addresses deep-seabed mining, twilight zone ecosystems, destructive fishing.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Data-driven ocean protection - provides measurable metrics for Environmental signals

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Circular economy, regenerative design, plastics reduction, critical minerals
new_sources_environmental.notes: Global leader in circular economy transition. Three principles: eliminate waste/pollution, circulate materials, regenerate nature. Major reports: 'Towards Circular Economy' series, 2030 Plastics Agenda.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Essential for Environmental-Economic intersection - circular economy is critical future trend

new_sources_environmental.specialization: Ecological economics, post-growth transformation, climate governance, monetary systems
new_sources_environmental.notes: University of Leeds. Heterodox economics approach: ecological economics, political economy, institutional economics. Six core areas from post-growth to sustainable cities.
new_sources_environmental.discovery_rationale: Fills gap in ecological economics perspective - connects Environmental to Economic policy

cross_category_bonus_sources.specialization: Climate adaptation, natural resource management, biodiversity resilience
cross_category_bonus_sources.notes: USGS partnership program. National CASC + 9 regional centers covering continental US, Alaska, Hawaii, Pacific Islands, Caribbean. Teams scientists with resource managers.
cross_category_bonus_sources.discovery_rationale: Government-backed climate adaptation - strong Political and Environmental integration

supporting_additions: International Network on Personal Meaning (Spiritual - Tier 2)
